lines.text:
[fearfully]
Do you realise what today's date is Rex?
Mocata isn't going to miss the chance of giving Simon his Devil's baptism at the Grand Sabbat of the year!
Tomorrow night! It's the eve of May Day. Within 24 hours, Simon could be lost to us forever.

[referring to Tanith]
We find the girl!

[to her servant about Mocata]
Show him out!
[walks towards door and stands behind Marie]
*I* shall not be back... but something will.
Tonight! Something will come for Simon and the girl!

[watching Mocata prepare to sacrifice her daughter, Peggy]
Those words you said before, say them again.

[urgently]
You must! My baby is going to die if you don't. You must speak those words again.

[carrying on with the ritual]
The bride of chaos.
With this knife, do I draw out the blood, which is thy life.

[possessed by the spirit of Tanith]
Only they who love without desire, shall have power granted them in their darkest hour!

[moves to the altar with Peggy lying on it]
Peggy, get up. Repeat after me, the words of the Susama Ritual. Oriel Seraphim.
[lightning strikes the altar and it explodes]

[sadly walks in carrying the body of Tanith]
She's dead!

[apologetically]
I know Rex. The Angel of Death was summoned. He cannot return empty-handed.

[watching as Rex and Tanith, now restored to life, walk toward the house]
Come in my friends.

[rushes into the room with husband Richard carrying Peggy]
She's alright!

Time itself has been reversed for us. Tanith's death; Peggy's abduction; the ride to Chilbury; the ritual in the cellar... all these things happened. But now, they have not happened. We're back. We are all safe again.
You will also remember, Simon, what I said to you about the Angel of Death once being summoned...

Exactly. Tanith has been restored to us. But the age old law demands a life for a life, a soul for a soul. And there is only one man in all this world who could replace her life, her soul. The man who invoked the Angel of Death. Mocata *is* dead.
Yes Simon. He is the one we must thank.

[after Duc hands Rex some vials]
Salt & Mercury. Effective against the dark forces. They will protect you and Simon... If we can save him.
